column4: Hi, I've a 1GB memory stick that only shows as 130MB after playing with gparted. I think the  heads, sectors/track and cylinders are wrong but how can I figure out to what I need to set this?
use gparted to set an msdos disklabel
that doesn't change the size does it? (/me tries it anyways)
just did it and lost another 20MB :s
